SIMILARITY RATINGS OF TEN COLAS BY TEN SUBJECTS (SHIFFMAN, 1975)
(the data have been converted to dissimililarities)

the stimuli are:
---------------
Diet Pepsi
RC Cola
Yukon
Dr. Pepper
Shasta
Coca-Cola
Diet Dr. Pepper
Tab
Pepsi-Cola
Diet Rite
---------------
